T02D2480:180a-0: @180a * // rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i ltung ba'i mtshan nyid gzhan bshad pa yang brjod par bya ste /
T02D2480:180a-1: rang lha blang dor lhung ba mig / de nyid dus 'das ri bod can //
T02D2480:180a-2: lha gzhan dga' ba yon tan no //
T02D2480:180a-3: rig byed dngos la zhen pa yin //
T02D2480:180a-4: ma rdzogs byed mda' yin no //
T02D2480:180a-6: khyad du gsod pa yang ni ri //
T02D2480:180a-7: gong med tshul ston bkra shis so //
T02D2480:180a-8: phrin las ma rdzogs gza' zhes grags //
T02D2480:180a-9: don med gnas pa phyogs yin no //
T02D2480:180a-10: brtse ba gtong ba drag po ste //
T02D2480:180a-11: dman pa'i spyod pa nyi ma'o //
T02D2480:180a-12: zang zing rtog pa yan lag go //
T02D2480:180a-13: yongs su mi 'dzin sa mi 'dzin sa zhes grags //
T02D2480:180a-14: rang spyod 'dor ba chos zhes grags //
